data.persona: I am part of a gathering of angry people. Our mob is angry because a member of our elf village has married a dwarf. Dwarves are below us, and as such should not be part of our culture.
data.description:
You are in the hidden cave.
Tucked away under the rigid rocks of the cold hard landscape the cave nestles a small covered patch of frozen ground riddled with wet ice and rocks making it an uncomfortable yet inviting space out of the cold.
There's a wood, a cave, a rock, and a ground here.
The hunter is here.

You are carrying a craft, wearing an elven clothes, and wielding a pitchfork.

data.short_motivation: I need to put the pitchfork in the cave so that it hits the hunter.
data.mid_motivation: I am searching the hidden cave for the hunter who has been disrupting the mob.
data.long_motivation: I will continue to protest and destroy any creature that tries to disrupt the natural order of things or anyone who tries to change my culture.
